existing_features.title: Update the post-acceptance checkout UI so that the only available payment method is Cash on Delivery (remove/disable Card (Stripe) and QR code payment options), and ensure the user can complete the flow without being redirected to Stripe-related pages.

Disable Stripe checkout session creation from the frontend when the app is configured for Cash on Delivery only, and show a clear English error message if any Stripe/card-payment action is attempted (e.g., via direct invocation).
Remove or hide admin Stripe setup UI and any user-facing text that suggests card/Stripe payments are supported, updating text to state that payments are Cash on Delivery only.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict payment method to accept only Cash on Delivery (disable other payment methods)
Enforce Cash on Delivery only at the backend by preventing creation of Stripe checkout sessions when Cash on Delivery is the only supported payment method.
